Package shaharas

Class SubOneRight

java.lang.Object
shaharas.BaseOperators
shaharas.BaseUnaryOperators
shaharas.SubOneRight
All Implemented Interfaces:
Operators
public class SubOneRight extends BaseUnaryOperators
The SubOneRight class represents the post-decrement operator (variable--) in an expression evaluator system. It extends the BaseUnaryOperators class and implements the functionality to perform a post-decrement operation where the value of the specified variable is decreased by 1 after being used in any further operations.

This class allows for initializing the operator with a set of variables and supports creating copies of the operator via a clone constructor.

    • SubOneRight

      public SubOneRight(HashMap<String,VariableEXP> variables)
      Constructor that initializes the post-decrement operator with: - A left operand value of 0. - A regex pattern for the post-decrement symbol ('variable--'). - The decrement operator symbol ('--') from the Utilities class. - A higher priority for the operator, indicating it should be processed after other unary operators. - A set of variables used in the expression evaluation.
      Parameters:
      variables - A map of variables used in the expression.

  • Method Details

    • clone

      public Operators clone()
      Creates and returns a new instance of the SubOneRight class that is a clone of the current instance. This method is used to create a deep copy of the current operator.
      Specified by:
      clone in interface Operators
      Specified by:
      clone in class BaseUnaryOperators
      Returns:
      A new instance of the SubOneRight class, copied from the current instance.

    • setA

      public Operators setA(int a)
      Sets the left operand 'A' for the post-decrement operator. Since the post-decrement operation works directly with a variable, this method does nothing as there is no left operand to set.
      Specified by:
      setA in interface Operators
      Specified by:
      setA in class BaseUnaryOperators
      Parameters:
      a - The value to set for operand 'A' (this value is ignored).
      Returns:
      The current SubOneRight object, enabling method chaining.

    • calculate

      public int calculate(String variable, int... args)
      Performs the post-decrement operation. The value of the specified variable is first used in any further operations and then decreased by 1. This operation modifies the variable's value after it has been used in the expression.

      The method accesses the variable's current value from the `variables` map, stores the value temporarily, decrements the variable by 1, and then returns the original value before the decrement.

      Specified by:
      calculate in interface Operators
      Specified by:
      calculate in class BaseUnaryOperators
      Parameters:
      variable - The name of the variable to decrement.
      args - An array of integers, where no arguments are expected, as this operation modifies the variable directly.
      Returns:
      The original value of the variable before the post-decrement operation.
